net.hudup.core.evaluate

Class RealTwoArrayMetricValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hudup.core.evaluate.TwoArrayMetricValue
      • net.hudup.core.evaluate.RealTwoArrayMetricValue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, MetricValue
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    R.PearsonTwoArrayMetricValue

    public abstract class RealTwoArrayMetricValue
extends TwoArrayMetricValue
    This class represents a metric value of two arrays of real numbers such as Pearson coefficient and cosine coefficient. Note, MetricValue interface represents value of a metric, which can be anything. Because this class extends directly TwoArrayMetricValue, it also contains two arrays of real numbers (two real vectors). Users will implement MetricValue.value() method to define Pearson coefficient or cosine coefficient, for example.
    Version:
    10.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
